name: By The Thousands
description:
Welcome to By The Thousands!

By the Thousands is an experimental prototype that allows players to sculpt and mould the terrain by making small changes and travelling far into the future. This game is mostly a demonstration of my implementation of a signed distance function based terrain system that allows players to alter the shape of the terrain at runtime.

Controls X keyInteract and perform actions with the different toolsTapping Z keyHolster tools or drop itemsHolding Z keyBring up tool menuSpaceJumpShiftSprint and climb
